name: Basic Life Support Certification
description: This badge is awarded for the successful completion of the Basic Life Support (BLS) training, demonstrating proficiency in fundamental lifesaving skills. The recipient has acquired hands-on experience in cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), automated external defibrillator (AED) use, and management of choking emergencies for adults, children, and infants.

criteria.narrative: Passed theoretical and practical exams covering CPR, AED use, and emergency response protocols.
